data.blankContent: Some people enjoy driving, but I find it to be an unpleasant chore. I ____ it ____ to ____ to ____ on ____ road, and ____ be ____ to ____ anything ____. I'd ____ have ____ freedom ____ occupy ____ time ____ another ____ while ____. For this reason, I strongly prefer the train or bus to driving.
data.partBlankContent: Some people enjoy driving, but I find it to be an unpleasant chore. I fi__ it unprod______ to ha__ to fo___ on t__ road, and n__ be ab__ to d_ anything el__. I'd rat___ have t__ freedom t_ occupy m_ time i_ another w__ while trav_____. For this reason, I strongly prefer the train or bus to driving.
data.answer: 有些人喜欢开车，但我觉得开车是件不愉快的事。我发现，如果你必须集中精力在路上，而不能做其他任何事情，那将是徒劳的。我宁愿在旅行时可以自由地以另一种方式打发时间。基于这个理由，我更喜欢坐火车或公共汽车而不喜欢开车。
